code:
bash
# Installer les dépendances
go get -u github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2
go get -u github.com/graphql-go/graphql
go get -u github.com/gorilla/mux
go get -u github.com/lib/pq
go get -u github.com/golang-jwt/jwt
go get -u github.com/gqlgen/gqlgen

# Créer un fichier de configuration pour PostgreSQL
echo "user='mon_utilisateur'" > .env
echo "password='mon_mot_de_passe'" >> .env
echo "host='localhost'" >> .env
echo "port='5432'" >> .env
echo "database='mon_base_de_données'" >> .env
